title: Willy Ley and Isaac Asimov - Essays on Chemistry
description:
ISAAC ASIMOV AND WILLY LEY - ESSAYS ON THE HISTORY OF CHEMISTRY 

Isaac Asimov_The 4 Elements_1 Earth
Isaac Asimov_The 4 Elements_2 Air
Isaac Asimov_The 4 Elements_3 Water
Isaac Asimov_The 4 Elements_4 Fire

Willy Ley_Johann Gutenberg's Secret

Willy Ley_The Chart of Chemical Elements
Willy Ley_The Search for Zero (Part I)
Willy Ley_Symbolically Speaking
Willy Ley_The Vanished Elements

This is the last of 3 Willy Ley torrents

Willy Ley - Essays on Astronomy (unzipped)
Willy Ley - Zoological and Cryptozoological Essays (rar) 
Isaac Asimov and Willy Ley - Essays on the History of Chemistry (rar)

File size, all essays, about 30 KB (without illust.). Format: htm, header with block css.

Source: Facsimile torrents, GALAXY and other magazines. The Asimov essays were first published in SMITHSONIAN (1971). Content, the 18th and 19th century history of chemistry (highlight, Lavoisier refutes the phlogisticon theory). They only touch briefly upon the Greek beginnings. My own scans but possibly already posted elsewhere. I am no unconditional Asimov reader. The Willy Ley essays (40ties, 50ties and 60ties) deals mainly with notation (underlying question, why did it take so long for chemistry to become an exact science).

-----------------

Ethnography gone wrong, Atlantis

I did add three orphaned FYI files to this small torrent.  

Willy Ley_Another Look at Atlantis ('rock solid', Thera explodes)
Willy Ley_News from Atlantis (Eric the Red shows up)
Willy Ley_Vineta (Q&A snippet)
 

Version 2014-03
